mapper.insert: insert into event(mno, title, cont, date, loc, addr, createdate, thumbnail) VALUES (#{writer.no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{date}, #{location}, #{address}, now(), #{thumbnail} )
mapper.select: select e.eno, e.title, e.viewcnt, e.createdate, m.nick, m.mno, ef.efileno, ef.path from event e join member m on m.mno = e.mno left outer join event_file ef on e.eno = ef.eno where e.eno = #{value}
